events.description: Author of the book 'An Introduction to Internet Governance'
supporting_quotes: The aim of the book An Introduction to Internet Governance, by Dr Jovan Kurbalija, is to provide a comprehensive overview of the main issues and actors in the field…
El objetivo del libro Introducción a la Gobernanza de Internet, del Dr Jovan Kurbalija, es proporcionar una visión general de los principales…

events.description: Author of the book used by DiploFoundation and universities for training courses
supporting_quotes: The text and approaches presented in the book have been used by DiploFoundation and many universities as a basis from training courses and capacity development programmes on Internet governance.

events.description: Author of 'Global inviolability of the Internet root zone' and 'Une introduction à la gouvernance d’Internet (6ème édition)'
supporting_quotes: The publication explains the Internet root zone and highlights the context and controversy of questions about its inviolability.

La gouvernance d’Internet n’est pas un sujet simple. Ecrit de façon claire et accessible, accompagné de chiffres et d’illustrations, il se focalise sur les aspects techniques, économiques, de sécurité, sur les droits de l’homme, de développement, socioculturels et sur l’aspect légal de la gouvernance d’Internet. Une introduction à la gouvernance d’Internet de Dr Jovan Kurbalija est utilisé par DiploFoundation et par de

events.role: Contributor to training courses and capacity development programs
events.description: Contributed to courses and programs on Internet governance used by DiploFoundation and universities
supporting_quotes: El texto y los enfoques presentados en el libro han sido utilizados por DiploFoundation y muchas universidades como base de cursos de capacitación y programas de desarrollo de capacidades sobre gobernanza de Internet.

events.description: Contributed to the book 'Multistakeholder Diplomacy - Challenges and Opportunities' as part of Diplo’s February 2005 conference in Malta and the Multistakeholder Diplomacy internship programme.
supporting_quotes: This book is a collection of papers from Diplo’s February 2005 conference in Malta and from research interns involved in our Multistakeholder Diplomacy internship programme.

events.organization: DiploPublishing, Mediterranean Academy of Diplomatic Studies
events.description: Authored 'Internet Guide for Diplomats', the first guide to assist diplomats in using the Internet in their work.
supporting_quotes: The Internet Guide for Diplomats is the first guide specifically conceived and realised to assist diplomats and others involved in international affairs to use the Internet in their work.

events.description: Contributed to the publication 'Modern Diplomacy', a collection of papers from international conferences in Malta in 1997 and 1998.
supporting_quotes: Modern Diplomacy is a collection of papers presented in Malta at the International Conference on Information Technology and Diplomacy (May 1997) and the International Conference on Modern Diplomacy (February 1998).

events.description: Contributed to the publication 'A tipping point for the Internet: Predictions for 2018'.
supporting_quotes: A tipping point for the Internet: Predictions for 2018

events.description: Dr Jovan Kurbalija shares predictions for digital policy developments through the GIP’s Digital Watch observatory and monthly briefings.
supporting_quotes: briefing paper, Dr Jovan Kurbalija shares his predictions for 10 main digital policy developments in 2018. The forecast is set against this broad backdrop that makes progress and retreat equally possible. It draws on continuous monitoring of digital policy carried out through the Geneva Internet Platform’s (GIP) Digital Watch observatory and further discussed during the GIP’s monthly briefings

events.description: Spoke at the closing conference of the EU TSI project Building Capacity on Evidence-informed Policy Making in Greece.
supporting_quotes: I was very glad to speak as EU Joint Research Centre expert last week at the closing conference of the EU TSI project Building Capacity on Evidence-informed Policy Making in Greece.
Jovan Kurbalija is the founding director of DiploFoundation.
